entity.name: HTML Reuse
entity.description: Pain points related to reusing and modularizing HTML content.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to reusing and modularizing HTML content.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to reusing and modularizing HTML content.

entity.name: Templating & rendering
entity.description: Authoring and running templates, data binding, reactive rendering, Declarative Shadow DOM, and server boundaries. Also includes issues related to the <template> element.
entity.descriptionHtml: Authoring and running templates, data binding, reactive rendering, Declarative Shadow DOM, and server boundaries. Also includes issues related to the  element.
entity.descriptionClean: Authoring and running templates, data binding, reactive rendering, Declarative Shadow DOM, and server boundaries. Also includes issues related to the  element.

entity.name: <​template> Element
entity.description: Issues specific to the `<template>` element, often about its limitations or ergonomics.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues specific to the <template> element, often about its limitations or ergonomics.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues specific to the <template> element, often about its limitations or ergonomics.

example.codeHighlighted: <template id="counter"> <div class="counter">Clicked {{ times }} times</div> </template>

webFeature.description_html: The <template> HTML element holds HTML fragments which you can clone and insert into the document using JavaScript.
webFeature.name: <template>

entity.name: Reactive rendering & data bindings
entity.description: Issues with reactivity
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues with reactivity
entity.descriptionClean: Issues with reactivity

entity.name: Data Binding
entity.description: Pain points around the lack of a native way to bind JavaScript data to DOM elements, so that changes in one are automatically reflected in the other.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points around the lack of a native way to bind JavaScript data to DOM elements, so that changes in one are automatically reflected in the other.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points around the lack of a native way to bind JavaScript data to DOM elements, so that changes in one are automatically reflected in the other.

entity.name: HTML Imports
entity.description: Lack of native HTML imports or templating.
entity.descriptionHtml: Lack of native HTML imports or templating.
entity.descriptionClean: Lack of native HTML imports or templating.

entity.name: HTML Modules
entity.description: Issues around the lack of or desire for HTML Modules, for packaging and importing components and content.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around the lack of or desire for HTML Modules, for packaging and importing components and content.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around the lack of or desire for HTML Modules, for packaging and importing components and content.

example.code:
<script type="module">
	import { TabList } from "./tablist.html" with { type: 'html' };
	customElements.define("tab-list", TabList);
</script>
example.codeHighlighted: <script type="module"> import { TabList } from "./tablist.html" with { type: 'html' }; customElements.define("tab-list", TabList); </script>

entity.name: Reusing HTML fragments
entity.description: Reuse HTML fragments from the same page
entity.descriptionHtml: Reuse HTML fragments from the same page
entity.descriptionClean: Reuse HTML fragments from the same page

entity.name: <​iframe> Element
entity.description: Pain points related to the `<iframe>` element.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to the <iframe> element.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to the <iframe> element.

entity.name: Iframe auto-sizing
entity.description: Difficulties in making `<iframe>` elements automatically size to their content's height or width, especially without JavaScript.
entity.descriptionHtml: Difficulties in making <iframe> elements automatically size to their content's height or width, especially without JavaScript.
entity.descriptionClean: Difficulties in making <iframe> elements automatically size to their content's height or width, especially without JavaScript.

entity.name: Reliance on JavaScript
entity.description: Lack of declarative APIs, slow rendering due to dependence on correct loading & execution of JS, issues around the higher barrier-to-entry of JS APIs, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Lack of declarative APIs, slow rendering due to dependence on correct loading & execution of JS, issues around the higher barrier-to-entry of JS APIs, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Lack of declarative APIs, slow rendering due to dependence on correct loading & execution of JS, issues around the higher barrier-to-entry of JS APIs, etc.

entity.name: Internationalization
entity.description: Localization, RTL, logical coordinates, culturally‑appropriate rendering etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Localization, RTL, logical coordinates, culturally‑appropriate rendering etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Localization, RTL, logical coordinates, culturally‑appropriate rendering etc.

entity.name: Declarative i18n
entity.description: The desire for internationalization and localization features to be built into HTML declaratively, rather than relying on JavaScript.
entity.descriptionHtml: The desire for internationalization and localization features to be built into HTML declaratively, rather than relying on JavaScript.
entity.descriptionClean: The desire for internationalization and localization features to be built into HTML declaratively, rather than relying on JavaScript.

entity.name: Web Components
entity.description: Pain points related to authoring and using Web Components (Custom Elements, Shadow DOM, etc.).
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to authoring and using Web Components (Custom Elements, Shadow DOM, etc.).
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to authoring and using Web Components (Custom Elements, Shadow DOM, etc.).

entity.name: Shadow DOM
entity.description: Shadow trees, encapsulation boundaries, slotting, parts, cross-root ARIA and integration with events, other APIs and page elements. Combine with `styling` for shadow DOM styling issues.
entity.descriptionHtml: Shadow trees, encapsulation boundaries, slotting, parts, cross-root ARIA and integration with events, other APIs and page elements. Combine with styling for shadow DOM styling issues.
entity.descriptionClean: Shadow trees, encapsulation boundaries, slotting, parts, cross-root ARIA and integration with events, other APIs and page elements. Combine with styling for shadow DOM styling issues.

example.codeHighlighted: this.shadowRoot = this.attachShadow({mode: "open"});

webFeature.description_html: Shadow DOM allows you to attach encapsulated "shadow" DOM trees to elements. A shadow DOM tree is a separate component, isolated from the scripts and styles in other parts of the document. This is a part of Web Components.
webFeature.name: Shadow DOM

entity.name: Declarative Shadow DOM
entity.description: Authoring, referencing, and tooling around Declarative Shadow DOM (DSD).
entity.descriptionHtml: Authoring, referencing, and tooling around Declarative Shadow DOM (DSD).
entity.descriptionClean: Authoring, referencing, and tooling around Declarative Shadow DOM (DSD).

example.codeHighlighted: <host-element> <template shadowrootmode="open"> <!-- Shadow content --> </template> </host-element>

resources.title: GitHub - mfreed7/declarative-shadow-dom: Declarative Shadow DOM feature development

webFeature.description_html: The shadowrootmode attribute on <template> creates a shadow root without the use of JavaScript. It is a declarative alternative to the attachShadow() method.
webFeature.name: Declarative shadow DOM

entity.name: Tables
entity.description: Issues around tables and table layout
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around tables and table layout
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around tables and table layout

entity.name: Table Layout & Styling
entity.description: Issues with styling tables, including responsiveness, sticky headers/columns, and layout control.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues with styling tables, including responsiveness, sticky headers/columns, and layout control.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues with styling tables, including responsiveness, sticky headers/columns, and layout control.

entity.name: Interactive table features
entity.description: Desire for native browser features for tables like sorting, filtering, and pagination, without relying on JavaScript libraries.
entity.descriptionHtml: Desire for native browser features for tables like sorting, filtering, and pagination, without relying on JavaScript libraries.
entity.descriptionClean: Desire for native browser features for tables like sorting, filtering, and pagination, without relying on JavaScript libraries.

entity.name: Security & privacy
entity.description: Threats, mitigations, permissions, and fingerprinting/privacy budget concerns, cross-origin issues etc. Pain points related to general concerns about security and privacy on the web.
entity.descriptionHtml: Threats, mitigations, permissions, and fingerprinting/privacy budget concerns, cross-origin issues etc. Pain points related to general concerns about security and privacy on the web.
entity.descriptionClean: Threats, mitigations, permissions, and fingerprinting/privacy budget concerns, cross-origin issues etc. Pain points related to general concerns about security and privacy on the web.

entity.name: Sanitizer API
entity.description: Issues related to the HTML Sanitizer API, including its absence, limitations, or ergonomics.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to the HTML Sanitizer API, including its absence, limitations, or ergonomics.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to the HTML Sanitizer API, including its absence, limitations, or ergonomics.

entity.name: Accessibility
entity.description: Obstacles in providing accessible experiences (regardless of cause), assistive‑tech compatibility, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Obstacles in providing accessible experiences (regardless of cause), assistive‑tech compatibility, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Obstacles in providing accessible experiences (regardless of cause), assistive‑tech compatibility, etc.

entity.name: Declarative APIs
entity.description: Complaints about lack of declarative APIs (combine with `limitations`), or current declarative APIs (as a whole) being hard to use (combine with `ergonomics`).
entity.descriptionHtml: Complaints about lack of declarative APIs (combine with limitations), or current declarative APIs (as a whole) being hard to use (combine with ergonomics).
entity.descriptionClean: Complaints about lack of declarative APIs (combine with limitations), or current declarative APIs (as a whole) being hard to use (combine with ergonomics).

entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to managing heading elements and maintaining a correct and logical document outline.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to managing heading elements and maintaining a correct and logical document outline.

entity.name: Tooling
entity.description: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).

entity.name: Missing elements
entity.description: The need to build common UI patterns from scratch due to the lack of built-in, accessible HTML elements.
entity.descriptionHtml: The need to build common UI patterns from scratch due to the lack of built-in, accessible HTML elements.
entity.descriptionClean: The need to build common UI patterns from scratch due to the lack of built-in, accessible HTML elements.

entity.description: Pain points from the lack of a native HTML element for tabbed interfaces, a common UI pattern.

entity.descriptionClean: Pain points from the lack of a native HTML element for tabbed interfaces, a common UI pattern.

entity.description: Issues around styling and customizing browser-generated UI.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around styling and customizing browser-generated UI.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around styling and customizing browser-generated UI.

entity.name: Styling
entity.description: Issues around styling UA-generated UI, CSS not working in certain contexts, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around styling UA-generated UI, CSS not working in certain contexts, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around styling UA-generated UI, CSS not working in certain contexts, etc.

entity.name: Component-Based Architecture
entity.description: Pain points related to building websites with a component-based model, such as state management, content composition, and framework reliance. Combine with `accessibility`  for accessibility challenges that are specific to or exacerbated by component-based development (e.g., managing heading levels, generating unique IDs).
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to building websites with a component-based model, such as state management, content composition, and framework reliance. Combine with accessibility for accessibility challenges that are specific to or exacerbated by component-based development (e.g., managing heading levels, generating unique IDs).
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to building websites with a component-based model, such as state management, content composition, and framework reliance. Combine with accessibility  for accessibility challenges that are specific to or exacerbated by component-based development (e.g., managing heading levels, generating unique IDs).

entity.name: CSS Integration
entity.description: Pain points related to the integration between a feature and CSS. For issues arising from the intersection of CSS features and accessibility, such as ensuring modern CSS layouts or 'clever' CSS solutions are accessible, combine with `accessibility`.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to the integration between a feature and CSS. For issues arising from the intersection of CSS features and accessibility, such as ensuring modern CSS layouts or 'clever' CSS solutions are accessible, combine with accessibility.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to the integration between a feature and CSS. For issues arising from the intersection of CSS features and accessibility, such as ensuring modern CSS layouts or 'clever' CSS solutions are accessible, combine with accessibility.

entity.name: Educational issues
